subject: RE: Fwd: Kiss Goodbye to MS Polo Day - Ticketing Page

full_threads.body: RE: Fwd: Kiss Goodbye to MS Polo Day - Ticketing Page

Hi Heath,

I can’t see your response below?

Thank you,

Tanja

From: Heath from WP Perk [mailto:heath@wpperk.com]
Sent: Friday, 7 September 2018 4:28 PM
To: Tanja Voss <tvoss@msra.org.au>
Subject: Re: Fwd: Kiss Goodbye to MS Polo Day - Ticketing Page

Tanja Voss was added to the conversation by Heath Maguire

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

Begin forwarded message:

From: Tanja Voss <tvoss@msra.org.au>

Subject: RE: Kiss Goodbye to MS Polo Day - Ticketing Page

Date: 7 September 2018 at 9:49:48 am AEST

To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Cc: Nadya Lyssenko <nlyssenko@msra.org.au>

Hi Heath,

It looks amazing, there are no changes from our end!

I only just had a thought in regards to the confirmation email, can you please make sure this includes the amount of tickets, premium and standard car boots and raffle tickets the guest bought? And can we please also include this in the report?

Once you’ve done that and the payment process is working, please feel free to make the page public. Please just let me know once you’ve done so and we’ll start to promote the page.

If you can please also make sure that the funds raised through this event are also allocated to the KGTMS website total and let us know is they will be displayed in the donation report or under EDM subscribers entries, that would be great.

Thanks so much,

Tanja

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ [mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au]
Sent: Thursday, 6 September 2018 3:57 PM
To: Tanja Voss <tvoss@msra.org.au>
Subject: Re: Kiss Goodbye to MS Polo Day - Ticketing Page

Hi Tanja,

Ok, here you go: https://kissgoodbyetoms.org/kiss-goodbye-ms-polo-day/

Let me know what you think and if you need any tweaks… and also let me know about the photo.

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M.0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

On 6 Sep 2018, at 3:03 pm, Tanja Voss <tvoss@msra.org.au> wrote:

Thanks so much Heath!

From: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ [mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au]
Sent: Thursday, 6 September 2018 2:36 PM
To: Tanja Voss <tvoss@msra.org.au>
Subject: Re: Kiss Goodbye to MS Polo Day - Ticketing Page

Hi Tanja,

Thanks for these… leave it with me!

Speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png

On 5 Sep 2018, at 4:30 pm, Tanja Voss <tvoss@msra.org.au> wrote:

Hi Heath,

Another email – my apologies!

Here are the remaining details for the Kiss Goodbye to MS Polo Day ticketing page. I’ve copied the previous details again into this email so you’ve got it all in one place.

Can you please set this up with the same format as the KGTMS Secret Garden page and use the following details and images (attached)?

Name: Kiss Goodbye to MS Polo Day

Date: Saturday, 6th October, first match starts at 11am, main match at 2.45 pm, with festivities kicking on until 8pm.

Price: $20 per person, car boots available

Venue: The Health Hub, 37 Ross St Goulburn 2580

Blurb for the top of the page:

Wallace Ashton invites you to attend the Kiss MS Goodbye Polo Day, in honour of Robert Bell - showcasing the exciting new Polo 3’s format to raise funds and awareness for MS research.

Fresh from their recent success at the Mongol Derby, Henry Bell, Sinclair Bell & Ed Archibald will play for Goulburn, taking on the Muddy Flatts team of Wallace Ashton, Henry Jones & Guy Higginson.

Pack a picnic and please join us for a day of thrilling polo and family fun.

Get your tickets (opens up a new page)

Step 1 – Number of tickets (1-20 a $20 pp), Number of Premium car boots ($80 each and only 15 available), Number of Standard car boots ($50 each and 38 available, Number of raffle tickets ($10 each)

Please mention the following: Children under 18 years old are free to attend

Step 2 – First name/ Last name/ Email address

Step 3 – Payment details

Thank you for your purchase! A ticket confirmation will be send to your email address. (Pop up window)

Confirmation email copy:

Dear (Insert name of buyer),

Thank you for purchasing your XX ticket(s) to the Kiss Goodbye to MS Polo Day.

We are looking forward to seeing you at the Goulburn vs. Muddy Flatts game!

Event details:

Date: Saturday, 6th October

Time: First match starts at 11am, main match at 2.45 pm, with festivities kicking on until 8pm

Location: The Health Hub, 37 Ross St Goulburn 2580

Parking: Directions will be provided at the gate

For any questions, please get in touch at kgtms@msra.org.au.

Wallace Ashton and the Kiss Goodbye to MS team

xxx

Thanks so much Heath!

Tanja

Tanja Voss

Kiss Goodbye to MS Senior Campaign Coordinator

MS Research Australia
